column2: Bull-teams of twenty yokes, long lines of pack-horses led by a bell-mare, mule-teams with a tinkling of bells and singing of the drivers, met the stage and passed with happy salute.
column3: Bull teams of twenty yokes, long lines of pack horses led by a bell mare, mule teams with a tinkling of bells and singing of the drivers, met the stage and passed with happy salute.

column2: This does not mean that the camp had collapsed.
column3: This does not mean that the camp had collapsed.

column2: This meant shafts, tunnels, hydraulic machinery, stamp-mills.
column3: This meant shafts, tunnels, hydraulic machinery, stamp mills.
